players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
Bob was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "Charlie is the detective and found out who the mafioso is."
Diana: "I have no information to share at this moment, but I urge everyone to stay calm and focus on gathering facts before making any hasty decisions."
You: "I believe we should focus on gathering more information before making any hasty decisions. Let's try to be as open and cooperative as possible to help us figure out what happened last night."

You: "Based on the information we have so far, it seems important that we all share any suspicions or observations we may have. Let's work together to piece together what happened last night and uncover the truth."
Charlie: "I will continue to gather information and keep an eye on Diana, the mafioso. Let's all work together and share any new insights we may have."

Diana: "I have no new information to share at this moment, but I want to reiterate the importance of remaining calm and focused on gathering facts. Let's continue working together as a team to uncover the truth behind Bob's death."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Alice (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format)
Diana was arrested

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Charlie
memory: You're Charlie, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Bob was found dead.
You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
You: "Charlie is the detective and found out who the mafioso is."
Diana: "I have no information to share at this moment, but I urge everyone to stay calm and focus on gathering facts before making any hasty decisions."
Alice: "I believe we should focus on gathering more information before making any hasty decisions. Let's try to be as open and cooperative as possible to help us figure out what happened last night."

Alice: "Based on the information we have so far, it seems important that we all share any suspicions or observations we may have. Let's work together to piece together what happened last night and uncover the truth."
You: "I will continue to gather information and keep an eye on Diana, the mafioso. Let's all work together and share any new insights we may have."

Diana: "I have no new information to share at this moment, but I want to reiterate the importance of remaining calm and focused on gathering facts. Let's continue working together as a team to uncover the truth behind Bob's death."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Alice (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format)
Diana was arrested

players.name: Diana

Night 1 begins.
You killed Bob.
